content: chain 2 turn double_crochet in each stitch across 82 row 23 chain 2 turn double_crochet in next 31 stitches decrease*10 double_crochet in remaining 31 stitches 72 row 24 chain 2 turn 26 double_crochet decrease*10 double_crochet in remaining 26 stitches 62 row 25 chain 2 turn 21 double_crochet decrease*10 double_crochet in remaining 21 stitches 42 row 26 chain 2 turn 21 double_crochet decrease*5 double_crochet in remaining 21 stitches 37 finish off with a long tail to whip stitch the top of the panels together weave in your ends bonus mitten pattern start with a magic_ring and ch2 as with the winter wonderland cowl ch2 does not count as a stitch working in the round do not turn round 1 10 double_crochet into your magic_ring pull magic_ring tight and slip_stitch to the top of your first double_crochet 10 round 2 chain 2 2 double_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to the first double_crochet of the round 20 round 3 - 9 chain 2 double_crochet in each stitch around 20 3 round 10 will be different for right and left l round 10 chain 2 14 double_crochet chain 3 skip 3 3 double_crochet slip_stitch to the first double_crochet made 17dc 3ch r round 10 chain 2 3 double_crochet chain 3 skip 3 14 double_crochet as to the first double_crochet made 17dc 3ch round 11 - 12 chain 2 20 double_crochet slip_stitch to first double_crochet made 20 at this point you will finish off and join a new color if you are making your cuffs a different color if cuffs will be the same color continue as written round 13 chain 2 20 double_crochet slip_stitch to the first double_crochet made 20 round 14 chain 2 fpdc bpdc *to last stitch slip_stitch to first fpdc to complete round 20 round 15 - 17 repeat round 14 20 finish off if you would like longer cuffs continue repeat to desired length thumbs return to thumb holes and attach yarn round 1 chain 2 evenly double_crochet 10 around thumb hole slip_stitch to first double_crochet made 10 round 2 - 3 chain 2 10 double_crochet slip_stitch to first double_crochet made 10 round 4 chain 2 decrease*5 as to first decrease 5 close thumb with an ultimate finish 4 photos and contact info you can find me on facebook https //www facebook com/sdcrochetcreations mibextid=zbwkwl or email sdcrochetcreations@gmail com 5
